page.title: 13A ten year old's weekend.
page.content: When I got home on Friday, I went upstairs and listened to some pop music. Then I went out to the shed to feed my four dogs: Manix the Jack Russell, Tim the Bulldog, Jumbo the Rottweiler and Buster the Alsatian. I took Manix for a walk because he is the smallest. Then I had My tea:_ egg, spaghetti and chips. Afterwards I called for Julie and went for a bike ride to the canal. When we got back to Julie's house, her mum said I could sleep the night. So we dashed down to my house to ask my mum. She said yes and gave us a bottle of pop, a bag of crisps, a chocolate bar and 20p each. The next morning we got up and watched a video. We didn't get dressed until one o'clock. I had dinner with Julie and then went home.
